name: touchportal_webpage_capture
description: Capture a webpage at a specific interval and display directly in Touch Portal

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && move touchportal_webpage_capture.exe base/Windows/TPWebpageCapture/ && del Installers\TPWebpageCapture-Win.tpp && cd base\Windows && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPWebpageCapture-Win.tpp TPWebpageCapture && del TPStreamChat\touchportal_streamchat.exe
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node14-macos-x64 . && move touchportal_webpage_capture base/Mac/TPWebpageCapture/ && del Installers\TPWebpageCapture-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPWebpageCapture-Mac.tpp TPWebpageCapture && del TPStreamChat\touchportal_streamchat

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
